description: If you take a lot of “reference” photos, Birch can make that part of your life a bit simpler! Just snap a photo, add hashtags, and that's it! Create photo notes in seconds and find them lighting fast when you need them later.

title: Dory
blurb: Run better remote company meetings and conferences. Free.
description: Dory was founded by a group of ex-Googlers who wanted a better way to run remote company meetings and conferences. Best of all, we made it free! • Q&A with upvoting • Public or private events • Allow anonymous questions • Shared and private meeting notes

title: Powermove
blurb: Interactive home workouts powered by an A.I. trainer
description: Powermove leverages A.I. to make home workouts interactive in real-time. Using your phone's camera, the app can automatically count your reps and correct your form. It feels like you are working out with a virtual personal trainer.

title: Subly Pro
blurb: Subtitle videos and audio automatically in seconds
description: Subly is an advanced and easy to use transcription tool that automatically adds captions/subtitles to video within a few clicks. You can also download the subtitles as a TXT or SRT file. More features are going to be ready in September 2020.

title: Threadia
blurb: The easiest way to read and create Twitter threads ✌
description: Threadia is a simple web application to help Twitter users read and create threads easily. It makes it fun and enjoyable to read threads, automatically transforms texts into threads and share them.

title: Bagsort
blurb: Luggage storage hosted by local shops
description: Described as the "Airbnb of Storage", Bagsort provides travelers convenient, affordable ($5.95/day), and safe luggage storage within major cities across North America. Our storage network consists of certified local stores & hotels with extra space available

title: Learning Space by HelpDesk
blurb: Get to know how to communicate with your market audience
description: Learning Space is an e-learning platform with guides and courses that will enable you to communicate better with your target customers. You will also find here ready-to-use templates for different forms of emails.

title: Winnie School Care
blurb: Find care and learning support for school age kids
description: Search to discover hundreds of qualified providers nearby, including home daycares, child care centers and micro-schools now offering online school and home school support for elementary age children.

title: BRIGHTLAND Vinegars
blurb: Living in a golden state
description: Meet Brightland's PARASOL and RAPTURE: two fruit-forward, double-fermented and family-farm to table Vinegars, each with their own distinct flavor palate and tasting notes, lovingly made in California.

title: DailyWall 2.0 (Mac + iOS)
blurb: Start every day with a new wallpaper
description: Every day at 10AM, DailyWall will change your wallpaper to one the beautiful hand-picked photos from our huge collection. Available on macOS, iOS and iPadOS

title: Talk to a Doctor
blurb: 24/7 access to affordable doctor's opinion
description: "Talk to a Doctor" is a response to the problem in medical clinics. Long queues and high prices of private visits force you to make significant investments of your time and money. We provide unlimited access to medical opinion, 7 days a week, 24 hours a day.

title: Neuro Flash Tester
blurb: Test your content before publishing within seconds
description: Optimize your content based on neuromarketing. Test your headlines, web copy, social posts, get content inspiration and optimize copy in real-time! 🎯 Set your content goals 🏁 A/B test multiple copy variations 💡 Get content inspiration 💵 Free 7-day trial

title: GitPigeon
blurb: GitHub notifications delivered to your Mac
description: GitPigeon brings actionable GitHub notifications to your Mac.

title: In One Motion
blurb: Get and use a powerful computer over the web in 2 clicks.
description: Powerful computers are expensive, heavy, and complicated. With In One Motion, you can save $1,000s and use a powerful computer over the internet in 2 clicks and 3-5 minutes.

title: Socially Browse Chrome Extension
blurb: Comment and rate any website without leaving the page
description: The Socially Browse Chrome extension allows you to rate & comment on any webpage without leaving it, specific to the webpage (not the website as a whole). No feedback box? Need advice? Or if you just want to leave your thoughts! You can use Socially Browse.

title: I Ally
blurb: Holistic support app for family caregivers
description: I Ally empowers young family caregivers by connecting users to mutual aid, administrative advocacy, Telehealth, a database of providers, financial & legal counsel, access to clinical trials and more.

title: Nute
blurb: A super simple lightning fast one page note taking app
description: Nute is a note taking app. It’s a super minimal product that just lets you start typing whatever you want. Everything you type on Nute will remain there even if you close it.

title: Our Lives In Weeks
blurb: Create, share, and order a grid of your life in weeks.
description: Our Lives In Weeks lets you create, share, and order a grid of your life in weeks. Create a free, beautiful visualization of your life and share it with your friends! If you love your grid, order a high-quality, custom grid poster. Inspired by Wait But Why.

title: Sticker Cards
blurb: Make stunning stickers from your Tweets & Notes for Insta
description: Sticker Cards is a brand new app for your iPhone that lets you create gorgeous content cards from Tweets and Notes. Now your Instagram posts and stories will look fire, your memes will be twice as more powerful with these meticulously crafted Content Cards.

title: Statuspal
blurb: Beautiful hosted status pages & monitoring
description: Statuspal provides beautiful hosted status pages that you can configure in seconds and comes bundled with simple monitoring so you can automate incident reporting out of the box.

title: ShareTable
blurb: Securely share data from Airtable in a portal
description: Share data from your Airtable securely with Partners, Customers, Clients or even your wider team. Let them read, update and create data. Control exactly which records they can access, and what fields they can see and edit.

title: Makerlapse
blurb: Document your journey in a timelapse video
description: Open source cross platfrom desktop app to record your work and make it a timelapse video of it with couple of clicks

title: Vibely
blurb: Crush your goals together with Makers
description: Vibely is the platform to crush your goals together Accept challenges, ask q’s, and get feedback from others Any community can achieve their dreams together. Lead your own: vibely.io

title: Read with Kaffae
blurb: Extension to help remember more from articles you read
description: Build long lasting knowledge from your reading through Kaffae's AI-powered reminders, analytics, and personal library.

title: ezVenture
blurb: Smart tools that make your startup fundraising journey easy
description: ezVenture is an online platform that democratizes the venture fundraising process. We help first-time founders to increase their chances to get funded by providing a free searchable database (live!), forum (live!) and automated tools (coming soon!).

title: Plumpicons
blurb: UI icons with character
description: 4,400+ vector icons with thick line width. Pixel-perfect. Customizable stroke. Available in PNG, SVG and ICONJAR.

title: REST by goodness
blurb: Personalized CBD for better sleep
description: REST is a CBD-powered sleep product designed to help you sleep better. Our personalized plans get you an easy-to-dose oral spray formulated with organic hemp and adaptogens, as well as a friendly chatbot to fine tune and optimize your dose.

title: Woven Calendar for iPad
blurb: Calendar with built-In scheduling & analytics for iPad
description: Woven Calendar for iPad is now here. Easily sync your Google + Microsoft calendars in one place. Upgrade your calendar experience with built-in scheduling links and analytics in one place so you can be more productive and spend your time on things that matter.

title: SMS Chatbot
blurb: Build your own SMS based text-bot in Botsify.
description: Create Chatbots in Botsify Platform and connect Twilio to answer your customer queries instantly via SMS. You can easily train your chatbots and customize them for more dynamic queries such as payments, online orders, education queries and discount deals.

title: Apostrophe Skincare
blurb: Prescription skincare you’ll want to use.
description: Apostrophe prescribes evidence-based skincare for concerns ranging from breakouts to hyperpigmentation– all online. Team up with our board-certified dermatologists to get a customized treatment delivered to your door.

title: The Great Tea App
blurb: Introduction to specialty tea with video guides and timers
description: An introduction to specialty tea, with video guides for different brewing methods and vessles, brewing tool and some introductory short articles on types of tea, brewing methods, equipment etc.

title: AirConnect
blurb: Whitelabel video-meeting portal for your customers & clients
description: In the age of lockdown, it's hard to make that personal connection. AirConnect lets you speak to your customers, clients and partners face-to-face 😄. It's also a fully-featured customer portal where your customers can access their data and self-serve.

title: Ritual Essential for Men
blurb: The scientifically-developed multivitamin for men ✌️
description: Essential for Men is a reimagined daily multivitamin with evidence-based nutrients in high-quality forms, backed by the first visible supply chain of its kind. All brought together with a delayed-release capsule and mint-essenced tab for a fresh experience.

title: Bullish
blurb: The Stock Market in your inbox every morning
description: Get a feel for the Stock Market every morning without having to go anywhere. Bullish covers major indexes and key insights into the market like pre-market futures, S&P 500, Nasdaq, and Dow Jones performance and a lot more.

title: Youpendo
blurb: Spread positivity & connect with people around the world
description: Discover new pespectives from Australia, Iceland or even South Africa. Youpendo is a social app that is entirely based on interactions with random people around the world so that you can inspire & get inspired by people you else would've never met.

title: SQUID User Flow Kit
blurb: Create user flows & diagrams in Sketch & Figma
description: SQUID 2.0 User Flow Kit is the Library for Sketch & Figma. Create User Flows and other diagrams quickly 🚀. All components may be 🎨 styled within seconds to match your brand. All components use shared styles and smart resizing constraints.

title: Tiny Broadway
blurb: Virtual kids platform to learn puppetry, drama and musicals
description: Tiny Broadway is a live virtual play-date platform that connects kids with accomplished actors, singers, and puppeteers who teach through immersive art. Parents sign up their kids for play-dates with performers of their choice. Play-dates take place on Zoom.

title: QR Card
blurb: Your business card on the smartphone lock screen
description: You just show the other person the lock screen and ask him to turn on the camera on his smartphone. It is the easiest way to share your contact details.

title: Remote Guide to the Galaxy
blurb: Community-curated wiki about remote and distributed work
description: Remote Guide to the Galaxy is an open collaboration project to build the most extensive resource for remote and distributed work. It includes articles, tools, resources, reports, and many more.

title: OOO (Email) Generator
blurb: Brighten someone's day with a funky out of office email.
description: In the fast-paced world we live in today, OOO emails have to stand out in order to grab someone’s attention. With our OOO Generator, all you have to do is add your time off information, and we’ll help you generate that perfect auto reply. Completely free.

title: Cape
blurb: The customer portal for Google Sheets
description: Cape is a web portal for your customers that uses the data from your Google Sheets. Customers can login, see only their information with tailored permissions and update details, add support tickets, modify orders etc. It’s as customisable as your Google Sheet!

title: Bird Alone
blurb: Become best friends with the loneliest bird in the world
description: Talk about life, make music, draw pictures and write poetry. Start each day answering your new friend's questions about life, death and the meaning of existence. Guide the bird through daily life as it confronts the same worries as the rest of us.

title: Luau
blurb: A shopping app designed for long-term sustainability.
description: Luau aggregates brands like Nike, Ulta, Gymshark and Allbirds and covers discovery, purchase and tracking. But the best part of Luau is that it shows the environmental impact of what it sells. Read the blog post to see how we're designing for sustainability!

title: FAANG Compensation Calculators
blurb: See how much you can earn in Big Tech.
description: Interactive calculators to show you how much you could earn at Facebook, Apple, Amazon, Netflix, and Google.

title: The Ops Show
blurb: YouTube show and podcast covering the developer journey
description: The Ops Show is a weekly YouTube show and podcast celebrating the developer journey. Every week a new guest comes on the show to discuss topics ranging from software development to DevOps and beyond.

title: Apple News+ Audio
blurb: The best narrative journalism spoken by talented narrators
description: Apple News+ Audio combines the best narrative journalism with talented narrators who bring the work to life, off your device and into your ears. Listen to all these great stories while you’re cooking, commuting, exercising, traveling — anytime you’d like.

title: TimeChi
blurb: Your smart productivity tool
description: Meet the Fitbit for your productivity; a deep work companion tool based on proven timeboxing methods

title: Bookshelves for Figma
blurb: Book tracking for Figma made easy
description: Bookshelves is a fun way to record and share the books you want to read. Track books with categories, ratings and key takeaways. After making your bookshelf, feel free to share your bookshelf on social media using #MyFigmaBookshelf

title: NSFW Filter
blurb: Web extension to block NSFW content using AI
description: NSFW Filter is an extension to filter out Not-Safe-For-Work images from your web browser. It uses state-of-the-art computer vision algorithms to detect and filter out NSFW content. PS: It completely runs on the browser. No data is collected from the user.

title: DigitalOcean Command Set
blurb: Manage and monitor your DigitalOcean resources from Slack.
description: A collection of Slack Slash commands that help you manage and monitor your DigitalOcean resources from Slack using Nimbella Commander.

title: Daily Journal
blurb: Journaling app where you can publish your thoughts online
description: Journal when ever you feel like it with the help of journaling cues. Publish your selected writings online to share with your friends or family, as a blog.

title: The Shoot
blurb: A marketplace to find and book local photographers
description: The Shoot is an open marketplace for people to find and book local photographers. We have a smart search-results algorithm which improves the speed and quality of matching customers to the best photographer for them.

title: BulkReplacer
blurb: Replace text in multiple files in seconds.
description: BulkReplace is an app that quickly finds and replace multiple files. Save hours of time opening each file, finding each word and replacing it. Simply upload the files, click a few buttons and you're done! Available for web and desktop.

title: Planethours 🌎
blurb: Discover your personal impact on climate change and improve
description: What if the climate change could be arrested by simply paying attention to our daily actions? ⠀ Planethours helps you to assess your personal impact on the climate change by answering few simple questions, giving you tailored advices on how to improve.

title: WordDeposit App
blurb: A pocket vocabulary for any language you want to learn.
description: Word Deposit App might be useful if you have decided to learn a new language. It will allow you to create your own vocabulary by adding new words in any language you want. This app is especially great if you are learning some language that is less spoken.

title: GoRetro
blurb: A free retrospective tool for your Agile sprints
description: GoRetro is a FREE agile sprint retrospective tool making the entire retro process seamless, simple, fun, colorful, productive, and unlimited.

title: VOX Music Player for iPad
blurb: High resolution, compression-less music player for iPad
description: VOX for iPad is finally launched. A unique audio engine is designed to play your favorite Hi-Res music with no compression at all. Plus, keep all your tracks in Unlimited Cloud with the original quality. Enjoy the full music power on iPad with a new outlook.

title: Magic Kids
blurb: Helping children learn through captivating AR-based lessons
description: Now kids ages 4-8 have the power to create their own educational experiences anywhere with your iPhone or iPad! Magic Kids helps children learn through immersive, interactive, hands-on lessons using new augmented reality and machine learning technology.

title: Good Annotations, Screenshot Capture
blurb: Capture, annotate and share screenshots from your browser
description: Use this Chrome Extenstion to screenshot your current browser tab in just one click, share it with a link and ceate useful annotations.

title: Svachat
blurb: Powerful chatbots for beginners
description: Intuitive and friendly Chatbots platform, it can be embedded easily without coding skills. We have designed a very simple self-creation process with an estimated time of about 10 min

title: GrowApp
blurb: Self-care assistant for life balance & personal growth
description: Self care assistant. Are you happy?

title: Femwyse
blurb: Featuring female founded businesses
description: Femwyse features women like you who are starting out and want to grow their business. If you are looking for female-founded startups, Femwyse is the place to start.

title: onWatch
blurb: First Apple Watch app to make you aware of face touching
description: Learning how to be aware of face touching can reduce the number of times you transfer germs from hand to head area, potentially reducing the risk of self contamination. Especially nowadays.

title: Meet Enhancement Suite Pro
blurb: Make Google Meet more like Zoom, the Pro edition
description: Google Meet, with super powers ⚡️ Meet Enhancement Suite Pro adds over 10 new features that helps make Google Meet a little more like Zoom – including picture-in-picture, dark mode, transparent bar, and more!

title: customDomainer
blurb: Put any site behind your custom domain
description: Now rebranded as https://cloak.istCloakist! Send your customers links they recognize, by putting any public site behind your custom domain. Change yourcompany.saasgiant.net/wiki into wiki.yourcompany.com.

title: Brandfetch for Canva
blurb: Bring logos into Canva
description: Tired of looking for logos? Brandfetch will save you time. Simply enter a company name, and instantly get the corresponding logo straight into Canva. It's fast, easy, and effective!

title: Second State VM
blurb: High performance secure & portable Rust functions in Node.js
description: SSVM is a high-performance WebAssembly runtime for server-side apps. It is safer and 10x faster than Docker. It supports OS access (WASI), AOT compiler, stateful apps, seamless integration with Node.js, and access to hardware (AI chips).
